welcome.title: Gephi Lite خوش آمدید به
welcome.disclaimer-1: Gephi Lite در حال حاضر در حال انجام است
welcome.disclaimer-2: با خیال راحت پروژه GitHub را بررسی کنید تا اطلاعات بیشتری در مورد ویژگی های آینده ببینید یا اشکالات را گزارش کنید
welcome.no_recent: هنوز هیچ فایل راه دوری در آن مرورگر باز نشده است

not_found.title: صفحه یافت نشد
not_found.subtitle: The page you were looking for doesn't exist.
not_found.paragraph: You may have mistyped the address or the page may have moved.

open.remote: باز کردن نمودار از راه دور

download.gexf: نمودار را به صورت محلی ذخیره کنید
download.gexf-error: An error occurred while generating GEXF file

github.title: احراز هویت GitHub
github.description: You can log into GitHub from Gephi Lite, to save and load graph files directly as GitHub Gists.
github.logged_as: You are currently logged into GitHub as {{username}}.

storage.restore_successful: Your work graph has been restored.

color.title: رنگ
color.default_value: Color for {{items}} with no valid value
color.data_description: All {{items}} colors are as they are in the input data file.
color.source_description: Each edge is colored as its source.
color.target_description: Each edge is colored as its target.
color.ranking_intro: Add color points on this scale

labels.title: برچسب ها
labels.default_value: Label for {{items}} with no valid value
labels.size_coef: Labels sizes (higher makes labels appear bigger)
labels.adapts_to_zoom: How much labels should grow with zoom
labels.density: How many labels should appear any time
labels.data_description: All {{items}} labels are as they are in the input data file.

size.title: اندازه
size.default_value: Size for {{items}} with no valid value
size.data_description: All {{items}} sizes are as they are in the input data file.

filters.title: فیلترها
filters.description: This panel allows to filter the graph by stacking filters.
filters.no_concurrent_edit: Only one filter can be edited at a time. Confirm current edition to edit this filter.
filters.inapplicable: Filter disabled: only one value available

edition.create_nodes_success: The node has successfully been created.
edition.create_edges_success: The edge has successfully been created.
edition.update_nodes_success: The node has successfully been updated.
edition.update_edges_success: The edge has successfully been updated.
edition.confirm_delete_nodes_one: Are you sure you want to delete this one node?
edition.confirm_delete_nodes: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} nodes?
edition.confirm_delete_edges_one: Are you sure you want to delete this one edge?
edition.confirm_delete_edges: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} edges?

partitioning.title: Partitioning
partitioning.description: To apply appearance or filters differently on different groups of {{items}}, partition your graph using any node qualitative attribute.
partitioning.warning_nbMissing: {{nbMissingValues}} {{items}} don't have a value for this attribute.
partitioning.missing_partition_preview: They will be grouped into a 'missing value' partition.
partitioning.missing_partition: They are grouped into a 'missing value' partition.

model.title: مدل ویژگی‌ها
model.no_attributes: هنوز هیچ ویژگی در مدل وجود ندارد

open.title: یک فایل گراف را باز کنید

local.title: یک فایل محلی باز کنید
local.error: An error occurred while opening the file. Please check that the file is a valid GEXF.

remote.title: یک آدرس اینترنتی باز کنید
remote.error: An error occurred while opening the file. Please check your connectivity and that the file is a valid GEXF.

cloud.title: باز کردن یک فایل از {{provider}}
cloud.no-data: You have no GEXF file saved on {{provider}}
cloud.error: A technical error occurred. Please check your connectivity or try later.

cloud.title: Save in {{provider}} as...
cloud.error: An error occurred while saving your graph. Please check your connectivity or try later.

png.title: گرفتن تصویر PNG
png.success: Your graph PNG export has successfully been saved.

caption.title: عنوان
caption.disabled: عنوان پس از تنظیم ظاهر در دسترس است.

statistics.title: آمار
statistics.success_one: The {{items}} metric "{{metrics}}" has been added to the data.
statistics.success: The {{items}} metrics "{{metrics}}" have been added to the data.
statistics.description: این پنل امکان محاسبه ویژگی‌های جدید برای گره‌ها یا لبه‌های گراف را فراهم می‌کند. این ویژگی‌ها در ادامه می‌توانند در پنل‌های دیگر، مانند ظاهر یا فیلترینگ، استفاده شوند.
statistics.nodes_attribute_already_exists: A node attribute named "{{field}}" already exists. Its values will be overridden.
statistics.edges_attribute_already_exists: An edge attribute named "{{field}}" already exists. Its values will be overridden.

louvain.title: تشخیص جامعه Louvain
louvain.description: هدف این الگوریتم تقسیم گره ها به عنوان گروه های متراکم متصل است.

getEdgeWeight.title: ویژگی وزن لبه
getEdgeWeight.description: یک ویژگی لبه که وزن لبه ها را نشان می دهد.

fastLocalMoves.title: حرکات سریع محلی
fastLocalMoves.description: Whether to use a well-known optimization relying on a queue set to traverse the graph more efficiently.

randomWalk.title: پیاده روی تصادفی
randomWalk.description: Whether to traverse the graph randomly.

resolution.title: وضوح
resolution.description: An increased resolution should produce more communities.

nodescript.title: متریک گره سفارشی
nodescript.description: Define a function that compute a metric for a node.

attributes.custom: Attribute name on which to store the metric

edgescript.title: متریک لبه سفارشی
edgescript.description: Define a function that compute a metric for an edge.

attributes.custom: Attribute name on which to store the metric

layouts.title: چیدمان
layouts.description: This panel allows computing new coordinates to nodes of the graph.

random.title: تصادفی
random.description: Random layout positioning every node by choosing each coordinates uniformly at random on the interval [0, 1)

circular.title: گرد
circular.description: Arranges the node in a circle

circlePack.title: CirclePack
circlePack.description: Arranges the nodes as a bubble chart, according to specified attributes

groupingField.title: ویژگی سلسله مراتبی
groupingField.description: An optional attribute to use to group the nodes

autoSettings.title: حدس تنظیمات
autoSettings.description: Generates settings that fit the current graph the best

adjustSizes.title: تنظیم اندازه‌ها؟
adjustSizes.description: Should the node’s sizes be taken into account?

barnesHutOptimize.title: barnesHutOptimize
barnesHutOptimize.description: Whether to use the Barnes-Hut approximation to compute repulsion in O(n*log(n)) rather than default O(n^2), n being the number of nodes

edgeWeightInfluence.title: تأثیر وزن لبه
edgeWeightInfluence.description: Influence of the edge’s weights on the layout

linLogMode.title: حالت linLog
linLogMode.description: Whether to use Noack’s LinLog model.

attraction.title: جاذبه
attraction.description: Importance of the attraction force, that attracts each pair of connected nodes like elastics

repulsion.title: دافعه
repulsion.description: Importance of the repulsion force, that attracts each pair of nodes like magnets

gravity.title: جاذبه زمین
gravity.description: Importance of the gravity force, that attracts all nodes to the center

inertia.title: اینرسی
inertia.description: Percentage of a node vector displacement that is preserved at each step. 0 means no inertia, 1 means no friction

maxMove.title: حداکثر حرکت
maxMove.description: Maximum length a node can travel at each step, in pixel

gridSize.title: اندازه شبکه
gridSize.description: Number of grid cells horizontally and vertically subdivising the graph’s space. This is used as an optimization scheme. Set it to 1 and you will have O(n²) time complexity, which can sometimes perform better with very few nodes.

expansion.title: گسترش
expansion.description: Percentage of current space that nodes could attempt to move outside of

speed.title: سرعت
speed.description: Dampening factor that will slow down node movements to ease the overall process

script.title: طرح سفارشی
script.description: Write your own layout by creating a function that returns a {x,y} object for each node

file.title: مدیریت اطلاعات
file.login_capabilities: می توانید از Gephi Lite وارد GitHub شوید تا فایل های گراف را مستقیماً به عنوان GitHub Gists ذخیره و بارگیری کنید:

auth.title: احراز هویت GitHub
auth.copy_code: Copy the code below, and click on "Open GitHub" button. It will opened a new tab, on which GitHub will ask you the code

graph.placeholder: جستجو برای گره ها، لبه ها ...
graph.help: چیزی را برای جستجو تایپ کنید

nodes.help: Type something to find a node

edges.help: Type something to find an edge
